pageProduct.name: Thursday Plantation Toothpaste Fluoride Free 110g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Toothpaste helps maintain healthy teeth and gums and assists in controlling dental plaque and tartar. Fluoride-free.

Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Toothpaste captures the unique antibacterial power of Tea Tree Oil to help maintain healthy gums and teeth.

Product Claims: Product not tested on animals.

Size: 110g

KEY FEATURES

• Helps maintain healthy looking teeth and gums
• Fluoride free
• Assists in controlling dental plaque and tartar
• Cleans teeth and freshens mouth
• Made with 100% pure Australian Tea Tree Oil

Warnings

Discontinue use if sensitivity occurs. Children less than 6 years of age should be supervised by an adult.

Ingredients

Calcium Carbonate, Water, Sorbitol, Glycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Hydrated Silica, Flavour, Tetrasodium Pyrophosphate, Cellulose Gum, Stevioside, Sodium Benzoate, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Limonene.

Directions

Brush your teeth daily with Tea Tree Toothpaste to maintain good oral hygiene.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
